subject: fix(query): improve connect mode mobile UX
body:
Sticky action bar on mobile so Connect/Clear buttons remain visible
when scrolling through the two query panels and connection settings.
Scroll fade gradient above the sticky bar hints at content behind it.
Collapsed summary now shows connection status ("Connected" vs "Not
connected") instead of generic "Connect Â· N items". Inline warning
when no paths found between the two groups with actionable advice.
